channel.title: 3 Questions
channel.description:
-Delta Base, 317-
1. How do i make a message appear in chatbox after killing a monster? 2. How do i make an accumulator keep some arrows? (like when you shoot it, you have a 60% chance of keeping the arrow you shot? 3. How do i make an npc talk overhead? ~Thanks
